name: Adda: Striga
ability: Zeal. Order (Predator): Consume a Token. If it was allied, double the boost from it.
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Predator): Consume a Token. If it was allied, double the boost from it.
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Predator: This ability can only target units with power lower than own.
flavor: And the striga's doin' fine. Sure, she takes a bite outta someone from time to time, but you get used to that.

name: Nithral
ability:
Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1.
Dominance: Damage by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 1
ability_html: Order (Melee): Damage a unit by 1. Dominance: Damage by 2 instead. Cooldown: 1
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.

name: Alpha Werewolf
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost a Beast in your hand by the number of cards in your hand.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied Beasts by 1.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost a Beast in your hand by the number of cards in your hand. Deploy (Ranged): Boost all allied Beasts by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: The most ferocious among these cursed are not even deterred by silver and alchemy's fiery pains.

name: Ozzrel
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard.
Deploy (Ranged): Consume a unit from your graveyard.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Consume a unit from your opponent's graveyard. Deploy (Ranged): Consume a unit from your graveyard.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: Some necrophages have taken such a liking to human flesh, they no longer are content to merely dig up corpses...

name: Old Speartip: Asleep
ability:
Timer 3: Summon Old Speartip from your deck to this row and increase its base power by 6, then Banish self.
If Old Speartip: Asleep takes damage, Summon Old Speartip from your deck, then Banish self instead.
ability_html: Timer 3: Summon Old Speartip from your deck to this row and increase its base power by 6, then Banish self. If Old Speartip: Asleep takes damage, Summon Old Speartip from your deck, then Banish self instead.
keyword_html: Timer: Before the end of your turn, lower the number by 1. When the number reaches 0, trigger the ability. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played). Banish: Remove from the game. Note: Does not count as being destroyed.

name: Abaya
ability:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Trigger an allied unit's Deathwish ability.
ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Trigger an allied unit's Deathwish ability.
keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard.
flavor: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!

name: Red Riders
ability:
Choose one:
Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 4 turns.
Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns, then replay a bronze Wild Hunt unit.
Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
ability_html: Choose one: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 4 turns. Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns, then replay a bronze Wild Hunt unit. Spawn Frost on both enemy rows for 2 turns.
keyword_html: Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: They paint the sky with snow and the earth with fire.

name: Ice Giant
flavor: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.

name: Wild Hunt Bruiser
ability: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row. If the target moves to a row affected by Frost, damage it by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Move an enemy unit to the other row. If the target moves to a row affected by Frost, damage it by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: He considers it an excellent joke - to split the skulls of the living with the skulls of the dead.

name: Harpy Egg
ability: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on this row.
ability_html: Deathwish: Spawn a Harpy on this row.
keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: A harpy egg omelet - a delicious delicacy, good sir. Quite dear, too, for as you might surmise, the wretches don't part with their eggs willingly.

name: Ghoul
ability: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Consume a bronze unit in your graveyard.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Consume: Destroy a unit and boost self by its power. If target is in the graveyard, Banish it instead.
flavor: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.

name: Naglfar Crew
ability:
Deploy: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns.
At the end of your turn, if there is Frost on the opposite row, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Deploy: Spawn Frost on an enemy row for 2 turns. At the end of your turn, if there is Frost on the opposite row, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.
flavor: Humans don’t know what powers the Naglfar. What is the source of its magic? For those that discover the truth... Well, it’s already too late for them.

name: Naglfar Taskmaster
ability:
Deploy: Purify an enemy unit.
Dominance: Purify any unit instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Purify an enemy unit. Dominance: Purify any unit instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Purify: Remove all statuses. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
flavor: She ensures the ship is sustained by squeezing the life essence from those insignificant human vermin.

name: Wild Hunt Rider
ability: Deploy (Dominance): Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Deploy (Dominance): Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.

name: Wild Hunt Hound
ability: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Dominance: At the end of your turn, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
flavor: Cry 'Havoc!', and let slip the dogs of war.

name: Archespore
ability: Deathwish: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Deathwish: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Deathwish: Trigger this ability when destroyed and moved from the battlefield to the graveyard. Note: Banished units are not sent to the graveyard. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Folklore claims they sprout from soil watered with the blood of the dying. Thus they flourish in grounds consecrated by pogroms, dark rituals or brutal murders.

name: Wild Hunt Warrior
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
Dominance: Also Spawn Frost on its row for 1 turn.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 2. Dominance: Also Spawn Frost on its row for 1 turn.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield. Spawn: Add a card to the game. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2.

name: Wild Hunt Navigator
ability:
Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the duration of Frost on its opposite row.
Dominance: Boost by the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side instead.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost an allied unit by the duration of Frost on its opposite row. Dominance: Boost by the total duration of Frost on your opponent's side instead.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Frost: At the start of the owner's turn, damage the highest power unit in this row by 2. Dominance: Trigger this ability if you control the highest unit on the battlefield.
flavor: For hundreds of years, Avallac'h tried to recreate the Elder Blood gene through back breeding - yet the elven children thus fostered were but dim sparks compared to Lara's flame.

name: Nekker
ability:
Thrive. 
Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
ability_html: Thrive. Deploy: Spawn a base copy of self on this row.
keyword_html: Thrive: Boost this unit by 1 or the specified amount whenever you play a unit with higher power. Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Spawn: Add a card to the game.
flavor: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
